output:
The change from winter grey to summer green is not so great as what I've seen
Though the transformation is unseen, it's beautiful
Freed from year-long work, time to take it easy, take it slow
No deadlines to meet, but no tests to wage you up above
No need to be up early organizing, but that's a no-go
Peace contented now to run upon the ground and touch it
Like trees that garden secret strings, feel the sun
Busy mind withdrawn, some deeper sense, finds in simple ways its rhythm dance
Fury heart withdrawn, we'll find it on, double with the fun
Seasons of the sun
Season of the sun
Season of the sun
